name: Codemasters Racing Collection
description:
This bundle includes: • F1 2018 • DiRT Rally • ONRUSH

MAKE HEADLINES in F1® 2018.

F1® 2018 is the official video game of the 2018 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP™.

DiRT Rally is the most authentic and thrilling rally game ever made, road-tested over 80 million miles by the DiRT community. It perfectly captures that white knuckle feeling of racing on the edge as you hurtle along dangerous roads, knowing that one crash could irreparably harm your stage time.

ONRUSH cuts to the chase, keeping you in the heart of the action, clashing with the pack for an unpredictable over the top experience that has never been seen before.

GET READY FOR THE RUSH.
